attributes.action: Press China government to save Lee Bo
attributes.additional_details:
Lee Bo, a British passport-holder, has disappeared in Hong Kong at the end of 2015.

He has a bookstore with other shareholders and most of books are scandals of China government. We suspected they have been kidnapped.

UK Government must press China government to solve the problem, and we hope the Parliament will debate about it.

https://www.facebook.com/agneschowting/videos/632120976928537/
